title: Shrubs and Grasses
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is gently sloped up to the north, flat to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
